0.message: Due to recent privacy changes made by Facebook, designed avatars that haven't been used by the account owner in the Bitstrips app will no longer appear. Unfortunately, this change is outside of our control and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience.

5.message:
I hope you will allow users to create avatars of friends WITHOUT connecting them to a Facebook account.  I have often wanted to do so even before Facebook totally screwed up anyway.  This could be useful in a few ways:

1.	Some people are just not all that computer savvy and have trouble using the Bitstrip app themselves
2.	Some people are not on Facebook

And there are probably several other reasons where this would be useful (celebs, whatever).  

I created numerous Bitstrip avatars of my family and friends.  I frequently got likes and favorable comments.  So, I think what Facebook has done is extremely stupidâ€¦.because it provides less content and reason for users to get on their site.

7.message:
Thanks for your feedback. We're not able to respond to everyone individually, but will read your message in the next 24 hours. Please read on for answers to common questions.

Known Bugs and Issues 
- Text bubble options like Shout and Whisper are currently unavailable due to technical changes we've made to the app. We hope to bring them back soon.

- Captions attached to comics do not appear when shared outside of Bitstrips. We are working to fix this issue.

- Designing and editing a friendâ€™s avatar is no longer possible due to changes Facebook has made to how it shares user information with developers. We are sorry to have to remove this feature.

- Comics shared via chat apps or saved to photo gallery are missing captions. We are working on resolving this issue.

- Can't Remove Headwear: This is a known bug and we are working on a fix that will be available soon.

Deleting your Bitstrips account 
Please follow these instructions to delete your account: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/170585223002660 - Note that you need to delete the app from your mobile device and from your Facebook account. Please allow a minimum of 24 hours before attempting to reinstall.

Commercial use 
You are free to use your Bitstrips comics for personal or non-commercial use. However, commercial use of Bitstrips (such as in ads or for-profit material) is not permitted. Sorry!

Choosing green eyes, balding hair and other avatar options: 
If you don't see a color or style option that you're looking for in the Avatar Designer, simply scroll down in that category to see more.

Thank you! 
Bitstrips
